description: Creates a new recommendation template for the Resilience Hub application.

parameters.name: assessmentArn
parameters.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the assessment. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app-assessment/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: Used for an idempotency token. A client token is a unique, case-sensitive string of up to 64 ASCII characters. You should not reuse the same client token for other API requests. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: The format for the recommendation template. CfnJson The template is CloudFormation JSON. CfnYaml The template is CloudFormation YAML.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name for the recommendation template.

parameters.name: recommendationIds
parameters.description: Identifiers for the recommendations used to create a recommendation template. (string) ---

parameters.name: recommendationTypes
parameters.description: An array of strings that specify the recommendation template type or types. Alarm The template is an  AlarmRecommendation template. Sop The template is a  SopRecommendation template. Test The template is a  TestRecommendation template. (string) ---

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Tags assigned to the resource. A tag is a label that you assign to an Amazon Web Services resource. Each tag consists of a key/value pair. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: recommendationTemplate
nested_items.description: The newly created recommendation template, returned as an object. This object includes the template's name, format, status, tags, Amazon S3 bucket location, and more.

nested_items.name: appArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Resilience Hub application. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: assessmentArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the assessment. The format for this ARN is: arn: partition:resiliencehub: region: account:app-assessment/ app-id. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) in the Amazon Web Services General Reference guide.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The end time for the action.

nested_items.name: format
nested_items.description: Format of the recommendation template.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: Message for the recommendation template.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Name for the recommendation template.

nested_items.name: needsReplacements
nested_items.description: Indicates if replacements are needed.

nested_items.name: recommendationIds
nested_items.description: Identifiers for the recommendations used in the recommendation template.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: recommendationTemplateArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the recommendation template.

nested_items.name: recommendationTypes
nested_items.description: An array of strings that specify the recommendation template type or types.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The start time for the action.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Status of the action.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: templatesLocation
nested_items.description: The file location of the template.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: prefix
nested_items.description: The prefix for the Amazon S3 bucket.
